page.title: 18The Police(J Beardmore)
page.content: On the 12th June we went to Cheadle Police Station to meet some of the 70 people who work there.First we went to the Mess Room & waited for Mr Tierney.When he came we went to where they take photographs & fingerprints. It is called the Interview Room.After that we went to the Cell Block,where the prisoners are kept.They were dull & only had a mattress & a wooden pillow,on top of the wooden pillow was a softer one & a sheet.We went to look at the Police Cars.They were Ford Patrol Cars.They had two way radios & flashing blue lights and a two tone siren.We saw the Lockers where the Police men keep their belongings before we returned to School. It was hard to imagine that long ago the Police Station was a Doctor's Surgery.
